ISSUE.TITLE: install doesn't include `urls` module
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: i pip installed the master branch: `$ pip install git+git://github.com/sunscrapers/djoser.git --upgrade` But at the auth root view i get `No module named urls`. The installed directory looks like this: ``` /templates __init__ constants serializers settings signals utils views ``` The `urls` module was not installed. Does it need to be listed in MANIFEST.in?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #74 from carlosfunk/master Fix some typos in README.md
